ing: 4 tablespoons red wine vinegar salad dressing
des: "I made this marinade one day when I forgot to buy it at the store. It's quick and real easy to make."
ins: In a small, nonporous bowl, combine the barbecue sauce, steak sauce, red wine vinegar salad dressing, soy sauce, Worcestershire sauce, mustard, garlic and salt and pepper to taste.
